text.section: The Commission shall adopt guidelines that establish a schedule for the prompt and timely processing and resolution of each complaint made to the Commission.
The Commission may not adopt a regulation that would allow the issuance of a conditional or temporary license.

The Commission:
at least once every 2 years, shall provide a copy of the regulations adopted under this title to each licensee; and
on request of any person, shall make available a copy of the regulations to that person.
